fields.name: Black Forest Tea
fields.description: Our Black Forest flavour is a combination of rich chocolate, sweet and juicy cherries, and a hint of smokiness that brings to mind the German Black Forest region from which it gets its name. The chocolate flavor is usually dark and decadent, while the cherries add a fruity, slightly tart taste that balances out the richness of the chocolate. A delicate, yet perfect balance of sweet and savoury.
fields.ingredients: Black Tea, black forest smoke flavour, cherry essence, vanilla extract.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Lavender Lemon Tea
fields.description: Our Lemon and lavender tea is a flavourful and aromatic blend that combines the tartness of lemon with the floral notes of lavender. It is a delicious and soothing blend that offers a unique flavor profile. It is an excellent choice for tea lovers looking for a refreshing and calming tea that can be enjoyed both hot or cold.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, lavender (dry), lemon rind.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Fig and Rose Tea
fields.description: Fig and rose tea is a unique combination of flavuors that creates a sweet and floral taste. The fig adds a natural sweetness and a slightly nutty flavour to the tea, while the rose petals provide a delicate floral aroma and taste. A delightful blend in that balances the sweetness of the fig with the delicate floral notes of the rose petals.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, fig extract, rose essence.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Summer Berry Tea
fields.description: Summer berries tea is a delightful blend of various berries, including strawberries, raspberries, blueberries, and blackberries. This tea offers a sweet and fruity taste with a hint of tartness, creating a refreshing and uplifting experience for the senses.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, red berries (dried), strawberry flavouring, candied blueberries, blackberry powder.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Blueberry Apple Tea
fields.description: Blueberry and apple tea is a flavorful blend that combines the sweetness of apples with the tartness of blueberries. When brewed, the tea will have a deep purple color and a fruity aroma that is reminiscent of fresh blueberries and apples.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, candied blueberries, apple pieces (dried).
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Apple and Marigold Tea
fields.description: Apple and marigold tea is a delightful blend that combines the sweet and crisp flavour of apples with the subtle floral taste of marigold petals.The taste of apple and marigold tea is smooth and refreshing, with a natural sweetness from the apple flavor that is balanced by the delicate floral notes of the marigold petals.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, apple pieces (dried), marigold petals.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Violet Mulberry Tea
fields.description: Violet and mulberry tea is a unique and flavorful blend that combines the floral notes of violet with the sweet and tart taste of mulberry. The unique flavour combination of violet and mulberry makes it an excellent choice for tea lovers looking for a flavorful and healthy beverage.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, mulberry pieces (dried), violet petals.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Honey and Apricot Tea
fields.description: Our Honey and Apricot tea blends the sweetness of Honey and the tangy tartness of Apricots. Combined, these flavors create a balanced and harmonious taste that is both satisfying and refreshing. The sweetness of the honey enhances the natural sweetness of the apricot, and the tanginess of the apricot cuts through the richness of the honey, creating a delightful taste experience.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, apricot pieces (dried), Natural Honey flavouring.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Earl Grey Tea
fields.description: Earl Grey tea is a timeless classic British tea enjoyed by tea lovers for its distinct and refreshing citrusy aroma and taste. Made from a blend of black tea leaves, infused with oil from the rind of bergamot oranges. The bergamot flavour gives Earl Grey tea a slightly spicy and floral taste, which makes it stand out from other types of tea.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, Bergamot flavouring, Lemon essence.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Ruby Bolete Rose Tea
fields.description: Ruby bolete mushroom and rose tea is a unique and earthy blend that combines the rich, nutty flavor of ruby bolete mushrooms with the delicate floral taste of rose petals. When brewed, the tea will have a light brown color and a fragrant aroma that is reminiscent of forest mushrooms and sweet roses. However, it's worth noting that mushroom teas may not be suitable for everyone and should be consumed with caution, especially if you have any health conditions or take medication.
fields.ingredients: Blac tea, dried ruby bolete mushroom pieces, rose petals.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Assam Tea
fields.description: Assam tea has a strong, malty and slightly astringent flavor. It is bold and full-bodied with a distinctive aroma that makes it an ideal choice for breakfast teas. The tea has a rich, dark hue and a sweet aftertaste that is often described as being reminiscent of caramel or honey. A perfectly robust tea ideal for any time of day.
fields.ingredients: Black tea (Assam).
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Ceylon Tea
fields.description: Ceylon tea, also known as Sri Lankan tea, is known for its robust yet smooth and mellow flavour. It has a medium to full body with a hint of sweetness and a slightly astringent aftertaste. Ceylon tea also has a bright and golden color when brewed.
fields.ingredients: Black tea (Ceylon).
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Classic English Breakfast Tea
fields.description: English breakfast tea is often enjoyed as a morning pick-me-up or with a traditional English breakfast of eggs, bacon, and toast. This timeless classic is diverse enough to be enjoyed at any time of day, regardless of the 'Breakfast' in which it gets its name.
fields.ingredients: Black tea.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Vanilla Earth Tea
fields.description: Vanilla earth blend tea is a delicious and aromatic blend that combines the rich, creamy flavour of vanilla with the deep, earthy taste of various herbs and spices. The taste of vanilla earth blend tea is warm and soothing, with the sweetness of vanilla complementing the earthy and spicy flavours of the other ingredients. The tea has a smooth and well-rounded taste, with a comforting and satisfying flavor that is perfect for sipping on a chilly day.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, natural vanilla flavouring, cinnamon, nutmeg.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Pumpkin Spice Tea
fields.description: Pumpkin spice is a delightful and aromatic blend of warm and comforting spices that are commonly associated with the autumn season. This exquisite spice mixture includes cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, allspice, and cloves, which combine to create a sweet and earthy flavour profile that is perfect for a range of baked goods and beverages.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, natural pumpkin spice flavouring, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Chamomile Elderflower Tea
fields.description: Chamomile and elderflower tea is a soothing and fragrant blend that combines the sweet, honey-like flavor of chamomile with the delicate, floral taste of elderflower.  Overall, chamomile and elderflower tea is a calming and comforting beverage that can be enjoyed both hot or cold.
fields.ingredients: White tea, Chamomile flowers.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Cinnamon Swirl Tea
fields.description: Cinnamon swirl tea is a delicious and aromatic blend that combines the warm and spicy flavour of cinnamon with the smooth and mellow taste of black tea.  The warm and spicy flavours of this tea make it an excellent choice for tea lovers looking for a flavourful and invigorating beverage.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, cinnamon, cream flavouring.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Dreamtime Tea
fields.description: Dreamtime blend tea is a soothing and relaxing herbal blend that is designed to promote restful sleep and relaxation. It combines a variety of herbs and flowers that are known for their calming and sedative properties, including chamomile, lavender, passionflower, and valerian root.
fields.ingredients: Green tea, dried lavender, chamomile flower, valerian root, passionflower powder
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Mango Lychee Tea
fields.description: The taste of mango and lychee tea is juicy and flavorful, with the sweet and tangy flavor of mango blending perfectly with the subtle floral notes of lychee. The tea has a naturally sweet and refreshing taste, with a smooth and satisfying finish that is perfect for sipping on a hot day.
fields.ingredients: White tea, dried mango pieces, lychee pieces, natural mango flavouring.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Classic Sencha Tea
fields.description: Sencha tea is a traditional Japanese green tea made from steamed, whole tea leaves. The tea is grown in full sunlight, which gives it a bright green color and a fresh, grassy aroma. When brewed, the tea will have a light green or golden color and a subtle, vegetal aroma.
fields.ingredients: Sencha green tea.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Spring Meadow Tea
fields.description: Spring meadow tea is a herbal blend that evokes the feeling of a sunny meadow in the springtime, with its fresh and floral flavors. Spring meadow tea is also known for its numerous health benefits, including its ability to promote relaxation and calmness, aid in digestion, and support healthy immune function.
fields.ingredients: White tea, chamomile, rose petal, natural honey flavouring.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Scaly Wood Mushroom Tea
fields.description: Our unusual Scaly Wood Mushroom blend has a distinctly mild and nutty flavour, outlined with earthy and only slightly sweet notes. Whilst commonly found in soups and stews for its 'umami' flavour, this beverage is ideally consumed warm on a cold winters day, much like one would a soup or stew without all of the additional prep work.
fields.ingredients: Green tea, dried scaly wood mushroom pieces, cinnamon, nutmeg, cane sugar.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Medusa Fennel Tea
fields.description: One of our Cottage Core Speciality teas, presenting the Medusa Fennel tea. Created with the Medusa's head mushroom and a fine blend of fennel, this earthy concoction will have you curious for more when hit with the aftertaste of cooling anise.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, medusa's head mushroom pieces, dried fennel.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Botanical Brew
fields.description: Botanical brew tea is a herbal tea that contains a variety of botanical ingredients, such as flowers, leaves, roots, and fruits. These ingredients are carefully selected and blended to create a unique and flavorful tea that is both refreshing and aromatic.
fields.ingredients: Black tea, valerian root, anise, bergamot essence, varying edible flowers.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Dragon's Pearl Tea
fields.description: Dragon Pearl tea, also known as Longjing or Lung Ching tea, is a high-quality Chinese green tea that is rolled into small, tightly-formed pearls. The tea is named after the shape of the leaves, which resemble small pearls or pellets. The tea is grown in the Hangzhou region of China and is known for its delicate and nuanced flavor profile. The tea leaves are hand-picked and then immediately pan-fired to stop the oxidation process, which preserves the tea's fresh green color and delicate flavor.
fields.ingredients: Jasmine green tea.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Rose and Raspberry Hearts
fields.description: Our Rose and raspberry cake hearts are a lovely and romantic dessert that is sure to impress your guests. The combination of sweet and floral flavours, with a tangy and fruity twist, creates a perfectly balanced dessert that is both light and indulgent.  These mini cakes are typically made with a light and fluffy sponge cake that is infused with the delicate and fragrant flavours of rose petals, and then layered with fresh raspberry jam and whipped cream
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, rose petals, raspberry puree.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Blueberry Cinnamon Swirl
fields.description: This blueberry and cinnamon swirl cake is a delightful dessert that is perfect for any occasion. Its fruity and warm flavours make it a great choice for breakfast, brunch, or as a sweet treat after dinner. A cake that is both sweet and tangy, with a warm and comforting cinnamon flavour that complements the juicy bursts of fresh blueberries.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, blueberry jam, cinnamon.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Forest Feastival Cake
fields.description: Our Forest Feastival Cake is a perfect dessert for any summer gathering or special occasion. Its light and fruity flavours, combined with the creamy texture of the whipped cream and the crunchy pistachios, make it a truly irresistible treat that is sure to please everyone who tries it.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, meringue, chopped pistachios, rapsberries, whipped cream.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a refrigerator and consume within 3 days.

fields.name: Strawberry Dream Cake
fields.description: This Strawberry Dream cake is a delightful dessert that is perfect for any occasion, especially during the summer months when fresh strawberries are in season. The combination of light and fluffy cake, sweetened whipped cream, and fresh, juicy strawberries creates a perfectly balanced and refreshing dessert that is sure to satisfy any sweet tooth.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, whipped cream, rapsberry and strawberry jams, strawberries, red berries, rapsberries.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a refrigerator and consume within 3 days.

fields.name: Summer Berries Square
fields.description: Our summer berry square is a delicious and vibrant dessert that showcases the natural sweetness of seasonal berries. The buttery shortbread crust provides a rich and crumbly base, while the sweet and tangy berry filling adds a burst of fresh and juicy flavour. It's a perfect dessert for any summertime gathering or celebration.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, vanilla extract, blueberry jam, strawberries, blueberries, raspberries, pink food colouring.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Choco Mint Cupcake
fields.description: Our rich and decadent chocolate mint cupcake is a popular dessert that is enjoyed by many, especially during the holiday season. The rich and chocolatey cupcake base is perfectly complemented by the refreshing and cool mint frosting, creating a sweet and refreshing dessert that is sure to please any chocolate and mint lover.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, cocoa powder, mint and mint flavourings.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Eight Layer Cake
fields.description: A tiramisu style eight layer cake that is an elegant and decadent dessert that combines layers of rich, espresso-soaked cake with a creamy mascarpone filling.  The combination of coffee-soaked cake and creamy mascarpone filling is sure to please any coffee and dessert lover, making it a classic Italian dessert that has become popular worldwide.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, coffee, dark chocolate.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a refrigerator and consume within 3 days.

fields.name: Blackberry Citrus Tarte
fields.description: This blackberry citrus tart is a delicious and light dessert that is perfect for warm weather or as a refreshing end to a meal. The combination of the tangy citrus and sweet blackberries perfectly complement the creamy custard and crisp pastry, creating a dessert that is sure to impress.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, double cream (milk), egg, lemon, blackberries.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a refrigerator and consume within 3 days.

fields.name: French Macaron Assortment
fields.description: Our assortment of French macarons is a visually stunning and delicious dessert that is perfect for special occasions or as a gift. The delicate and colorful macarons are a feast for the eyes, while the combination of crispy shells and creamy fillings provide a heavenly taste experience. Flavours include: Vanilla, Pistachio, Coffee, Strawberry and Lemon.
fields.ingredients: Almond flour, sugar, butter, milk, vanilla extract.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a refrigerator and consume within 7 days.

fields.name: Black Forest Cupcake
fields.description: Inspired by the classic German black forest cake, this indulgent dessert combines the rich flavours of chocolate, cherries, and whipped cream. The moist cupcake base, sweet cherry filling, and light whipped cream topping provide a perfect balance of textures and flavours, making it a popular choice for special occasions or as a decadent treat.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, cocoa powder, cherry jam, whipped cream.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a refrigerator and consume within 3 days.

fields.name: Summer Fruit Cake
fields.description: A summer fruit cake is a light and fruity dessert that typically features a variety of fresh seasonal fruits, such as strawberries, raspberries, blueberries. The combination of light and fluffy sponge cake, creamy whipped cream, and juicy and colorful fruits provides a beautiful and delicious dessert that is sure to impress guests.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, strawberries, raspberries, blueberries, synthetic cream, fruit preserves.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a refrigerator and consume within 3 days.

fields.name: Honey Heart Cookies
fields.description: Our honey heart cookies are a delicate and buttery treat that are both delicious and visually appealing. The subtle sweetness of the honey pairs perfectly with the rich buttery flavour of the cookie, making them a perfect dessert for any occasion.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, honey.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Ginger Nut Sugar Cookies
fields.description: Our Ginger nut sugar cookies are crispy on the outside and soft and chewy on the inside, with a warm and spicy ginger flavour that is perfect for the holiday season. They can be served with a glass of milk or a cup of tea, or just enjoyed on their own as a day time treat.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, ginger, anise, nutmeg, cloves.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Double Chocolate Soft Bakes
fields.description: Double chocolate soft bake cookies are a decadent and rich treat that are perfect for chocolate lovers. These cookies are soft and chewy, with a gooey center and a rich chocolate flavour.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, cocoa powder, cacoa nibs.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Mini Cookie Assortment
fields.description: Our mini German-style cookie assortment is a selection of small cookies that are commonly found in Germany. These assortments may include classic flavours like Lebkuchen, Pfeffern√ºsse, Zimtsterne, and Springerle, as well as other traditional German cookies.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, white pepper, nutmeg, cloves, cinnamon, cardamom, vanilla, anise.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Ginger Almond Cookies
fields.description: Crispy on the outside and soft and chewy on the inside, Our Ginger and almond cookies are a delicious and fragrant treat that combine the warm and spicy flavour of ginger with the nuttiness of almonds. These cookies are perfect for serving with tea or coffee, and are our most popular choice during the fall and winter months.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, ginger, nutmeg, ground almonds.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Linzer Cookies - Raspberry Filled
fields.description: Raspberry Linzer cookies are a type of sandwich cookie with a tender, buttery shortbread base that is lightly flavoured with ground almonds, and a tart raspberry jam filling. Cut into round or heart shapes, and then topped off  with powdered sugar, with the jam peeking out through a small cut-out window in the center of the cookie. The name 'Linzer' comes from the Austrian city of Linz, where this type of cookie is said to have originated.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, rapsberry jam.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.

fields.name: Daisy Sugar Cookies
fields.description: Our Daisy sugar cookies are  a simple sugar-style cookie, mixed with a smattering of daisies for a spring time treat. We suggest them to be served alongside a traditional black tea such as Assam for its contrasting malty flavour.
fields.ingredients: Flour, sugar, butter, milk, egg, vanilla flavour, crushed daisy.
fields.storage: Once opened, store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place.
